name: American Montessori Society
description: AMS is the leading Montessori organization in the United States, providing accreditation for schools that implement authentic Montessori education. AMS accreditation ensures schools follow Dr. Maria Montessori's educational philosophy with fidelity while meeting high standards for student development.
recognition: AMS accreditation is recognized nationwide as the gold standard for Montessori education. Many families seeking Montessori education for children with autism specifically seek AMS-accredited schools.
